::Zardus::

Zardus nods. "We can discuss payment after you show how well you fight. I 
have no doupts, but proof would help. For now let's says you can use base 
facilities and resources. If you prove good fighters, this planet has much 
energon, and my base has the tools to harvest it. The Ark is that way." He 
says, pointing to the apropriate direction.
